thread.title: Honda to Trim Production of Its Flagship Sedan

author: Adrienne Roberts
title: Honda to Trim Production of Its Flagship Sedan
text:
Workers assembling Honda Motor Co.â€™s Accord will take off a total of two weeks from building the sedan over the next several months as the auto maker works to adjust bloated inventories.
Unlike Detroit auto makers that have either eliminated entire sedan lines or slowed down sedan production over the past year, Japanese, German and Korean auto makers haven't taken their foot off the pedal.
